nodes.text: Star Wars - Magazine (German: Star Wars - Magazin) was a series of tri-monthly Magazines released by Panini Germany. As indicated by the title, it was a German-based publication dealing with various Star Wars properties. 23 issues have been released as of November 8, 2017. Each issue costs roughly 3.80 Euros. Among others, the magazine issues contain comic adaptations of Star Wars: Smuggler's Run and Star Wars: The Weapon of a Jedi.
